1619850.name: Causa, Voices of the Dusk - Premium Starter Kit
1619850.description:
Welcome to Causa!

Get started with the Premium Starter Kit, a new kit for your adventure in Causa.

The Premium Starter Kit includes:

  • 12 Card Packs
  • 1,350 Organite
  • Unique Premium Amulet Card Back.



Each Card Pack includes 5 cards of different Rarity (Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary), allowing you to start upgrading your own decks.

Keep in mind that for every 20 Card Packs you open in the game, you’ll receive a Legendary Card Pack for free. This type of pack guarantees a Legendary Card.



Organite (Crystals) may be spent in the game to buy items such as Leaders (750 Organite), Card Packs (200 Organite), Card Backs (750 Organite), and more!



Add the Unique Premium Amulet Card Back to your collection, and showcase it while battling your enemies. This special item will only be available by acquiring this kit.

This kit can only be purchased on Steam once per account.
1619850.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
